title: Performance Issues only with this game
body:
League has always given me crap performance wise, and I'm really trying to fix it but I can't pin it down to anything, and so far nothing has worked.
Performance issues I suffer: Lower FPS than what I should be, stuttering, frame drops, freezing on death. 
Specs: 
i5-4670k, GTX980, 16gb RAM. 

I play on a 144hz monitor so getting as many frames as possible is very important to me. I know my GPU is well capable of pushing out over 144fps at all times.
For reference: There's a video on YouTube where someone is playing ultra 1080p with a gtx750ti and an FX-6300 CPU - much lower specced than my PC yet he seems to achieve a constantly higher frame rate than what I ever get. 

Any solutions to this?

replies.body: Have you checked to see if your GPU is boosting to 3D clocks and not sitting at 2D? League isn't very GPU intensive and even my 1070 will only boost to <1600mhz instead of it's normal 2000. Infact it sits much MUCH lower 90% of the time. You could try changing the power management mode in the nvidia control panel to adaptive or prefer maximum performance to see if that helps.

Hey man, 

The Wrenchmen are a bit busy this week, but I can try get the ball rolling in the meantime ;)
It would be super helpful for us if you could answer as many of these as you can:

+ Do you have _"wait for vertical sync"_ enabled in League?

+ Do you have _"use movement prediction"_ enabled in League?

+ Do you have V-sync enabled for your driver?

+ What do you usually run in the background while you play League? Any programs with overlays? (e.g. Cursed Voice or Overwolf)

+ When was the last time you updated your drivers?

+ Have you made any changes with your graphics card software?

+ What's your power supply's wattage?

No VSYNC enabled, no movement prediction, I have no idea about V-sync enabling for my driver, drivers were last updated approximately 2 weeks ago, no changes made to my graphics card software,  background stuff I run is usually Chrome, Spotify and Discord. and my power supply is 750w :)

I might just add this is the only game where I have performance issues, everything else runs smooths as.

Hey, thanks for the quick reply, I'll pass that on to them. With a bit of luck we can hopefully get something fixed. 

Also while you're at it, make sure you're able to get a [DirectX Diagnostic](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#wq5) since the Wrenchmen will likely ask you to send them one.
Is there any update from the wrenchmen?

Sorry for the late reply. But yeah, I think they're a little stumped about what's going on. Have you been in contact with Riot Support yet? At this point it's the best move IMO, you can get in touch with them [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
